name: Eclipse (gensuta)
description:
Eclipse is a short little rhythm game game made for NYU Game Center's Music and Gameplay Class.

The controls are ASD and JKL ( it will be obvious when to press each )

Also yes harold, they're lesbians c:

Known Bugs
- Sometimes the notes aren't deleted if you press the correct key
- Sometimes the notes bounce upwards when you press it correctly?? It's not very common
- This one isn't a bug but I didn't spend as much times I'd like to on this game >-> If you miss a note you will not be penalized. Couldn't decide if I wanted to penalize players for missing especially because I was envisioning this as a cute, more narrative rhythm game if that makes sense? But yeah.
